from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
import os

class SaveTextToMD(Component):
    display_name = "Save Text to MD"
    description = "Saves the input text as a .md file in the specified directory."
    icon = "SaveTextToMD"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="input_text",
            display_name="Text",
            info="The text to be saved.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="filename",
            display_name="Filename",
            info="The name of the file to save the text as (.md extension will be added automatically).",
            value="chat_message",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="directory",
            display_name="Directory",
            info="The directory where the file will be saved. If left empty, the current working directory will be used.",
            value=os.getcwd(),  # Default to current working directory
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="File Path", name="file_path", method="save_text_to_md"),
    ]

    def save_text_to_md(self) -> str:
        input_text = self.input_text
        filename = self.filename + ".md"
        directory = self.directory

        # Ensure the directory exists, if not, create it
        if not os.path.exists(directory):
            os.makedirs(directory)

        # Save the input text to a .md file in the specified directory
        file_path = os.path.join(directory, filename)
        with open(file_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as file:
            file.write(input_text)

        self.status = f"Text saved to {file_path}"
        return file_path

    def run(self):
        return self.save_text_to_md()
